special_powers.name: ORIGINS OF THE DARK KNIGHT
special_powers.description: Batman can use Incapacitate. If he has KO'd an opposing character this game, when he uses Incapacitate, he may also deal his printed damage value, divided any way you choose among the hit targets.

special_powers.name: REMOTE BATARANG
special_powers.description: When Batman makes a ranged combat attack he may draw lines of fire from any one square within range and line of fire, but the target must be within range of Batman.

special_powers.name: EXPLOSIVE GEL
special_powers.description: Give Batman a free action and destroy an adjacent wall or square of blocking terrain.

special_powers.name: MINION:FALSE FACER
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Black Mask is within 8 squares, Black Mask Thug can use Shape Change.

special_powers.name: HIRED ASSASSIN
special_powers.description: During your first turn, choose an opposing character. If Electrocutioner KO's that character, you score an additional 50 victory points.

special_powers.name: ELECTRIC SHOCK GLOVES
special_powers.description: Electrocutioner can use Quake. When he does, hit characters are given an action token and are not knocked back.

special_powers.name: MINION: I'VE GOT INFO FOR YOU, BOSS
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named The Penguin is within 8 squares, The Penguin Thug can use Perplex, but only to decrease combat values of opposing characters.

special_powers.name: BO STAFF
special_powers.description: Robin can use Incapacitate. When he uses it to make a close combat attack and hits, Robin may use Incapacitate as a free action targeting the same character.

special_powers.name: MINION: JOKER SAYS I'M EXPENDABLE
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named The Joker is within 8 squares, The Joker Thug can use Poison. When he does, The Joker Thug is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: FIREBOMB
special_powers.description: Anarky can use Energy Explosion. When Anarky hits with a ranged combat attack, he can use Smoke Cloud as a free action, but may only place hindering terrain markers in the target's square and squares adjacent to the target.

special_powers.name: MINION: SOLDIERS OF FORTUNE
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Bane is within 8 squares, Bane Thug can use Willpower.

special_powers.name: ORIGINS OF A MADMAN
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Poison. If he has KO'd an opposing character this game, when he uses Poison, damage dealt is penetrating.

special_powers.name: JOKER GAS
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Smoke Cloud. When he uses Poison, The Joker may treat all opposing figures which ended the previous turn adjacent to one of his hindering terrain markers as adjacent.

special_powers.name: I'LL TEST YOUR CODE
special_powers.description: Give The Joker a free action and choose an opposing character within range and line of fire. Until your next turn, if that character makes an attack, it may only target The Joker.

special_powers.name: ORIGINS OF ORACLE
special_powers.description: Barbara Gordon can use Perplex. If she has KO'd an opposing character this game, when she uses Perplex she may count squares and draw lines of fire from any friendly character's square.

special_powers.name: BUDDING DETECTIVE
special_powers.description: When Barbara Gordon is adjacent to a friendly character, give her a free action to immediately use Outwit until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ORIGINS OF THE COMMISSIONER
special_powers.description: Captain Jim Gordon can use the Capture ability. The first time he releases a captive, choose a friendly character with a lower point value. That character can use the Capture ability as long as Captain Jim Gordon is on the map.

special_powers.name: ROUND THEM UP
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters that share a keyword with Captain Jim Gordon can use Sidestep.

special_powers.name: ORIGINS OF THE RIDDLER
special_powers.description: E. Nigma can use Outwit. If he has KO'd an opposing character this game, when he uses Outwit, he can also use Perplex, but only to target the same character.

special_powers.name: I LOVE A GOOD RIDDLE
special_powers.description: E. Nigma can use Probability Control. When he does and it isn't your turn, if the final attack roll is unsuccessful, give the attacker an action token.

special_powers.name: INFORMATION BROKER
special_powers.description: The Penguin can use Leadership and Outwit. He may activate Outwit with a power action instead of a free action and, when he does, he can count squares and draw lines of fire from the square of a friendly character that shares a keyword with him.

special_powers.name: HIRED ASSASSIN
special_powers.description: During your first turn, choose an opposing character. If Copperhead KO's that character, you score an additional 50 victory points.

special_powers.name: HALLUCINOGENIC POISONS
special_powers.description: Copperhead can use Poison. Give Copperhead a power action and choose an adjacent opposing character; deal that character 1 penetrating damage and give it a Poison token if it doesn't already have one. Even if this power is lost, characters with a Poison token modify their attack and damage values by -1 and may be given a power action to remove that token.

special_powers.name: VAST FORTUNE
special_powers.description: Give Black Mask a power action and all adjacent friendly characters that have the Assassin keyword or share a keyword with him may immediately be given a move action as a free action.

special_powers.name: DETERMINED TO BREAK YOU
special_powers.description: Black Mask can use Toughness and Willpower.

special_powers.name: HIRED ASSASSIN
special_powers.description: During your first turn, choose an opposing character. If Deadshot KO's that character, you score an additional 50 victory points.

special_powers.name: I NEVER MISS
special_powers.description: If Deadshot targets a single opposing character with a ranged combat attack, he can use Probability Control for that attack.

special_powers.name: HIRED ASSASSIN
special_powers.description: During your first turn, choose an opposing character. If Firefly KO's that character, you score an additional 50 victory points.

special_powers.name: WATCH IT BURN
special_powers.description: When Firefly hits an opposing character, give that character a Burn token. Characters with a Burn token can't use Stealth. At the beginning of your next turn, remove the Burn token, deal that character 1 damage, and place a hindering terrain marker in a square that character occupies.

special_powers.name: HIRED ASSASSIN
special_powers.description: During your first turn, choose an opposing character. If Shiva KO's that character, you score an additional 50 victory points.

special_powers.name: FROM THE SHADOWS
special_powers.description: Shiva can use Stealth. When Shiva occupies hindering terrain at the beginning of your turn, she can use Charge and Exploit Weakness.

special_powers.name: HIRED ASSASSIN
special_powers.description: During your first turn, choose an opposing character. If Killer Croc KO's that character, you score an additional 50 victory points.

special_powers.name: UP FROM THE SEWERS
special_powers.description: When Killer Croc occupies water terrain, he can use Charge and Sidestep.

special_powers.name: HIRED ASSASSIN
special_powers.description: During your first turn, choose an opposing character. If Deathstroke KO's that character, you score an additional 50 victory points.

special_powers.name: REMOTE CLAW
special_powers.description: Deathstroke can use Incapacitate. When he does, he may also deal his printed damage value, divided any way you choose among hit targets.

special_powers.name: SUPER SOLDIER SERUM
special_powers.description: Deathstroke can use Regeneration and Toughness. When Deathstroke uses Regeneration, only subtract 1 from the d6 roll.

special_powers.name: HIRED ASSASSIN
special_powers.description: During your first turn, choose an opposing character. If Bane KO's that character, you score an additional 50 victory points.

special_powers.name: TH1 SERUM
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed while taking damage, stop turning the dial, roll a D6, and subtract 3 (minimum 1). Increase Bane's combat values by the result as long as Bane possesses this power. Bane can use Invulnerability. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: RPG
special_powers.description: Bane can use Energy Explosion, Ranged Combat Expert and Improved Targeting: Hindering, Destroy Blocking as if he had a range value of 8. Bane may only use Improved Targeting: Destroy Blocking to ignore up to 1 square of blocking terrain or a wall.
